Description:
Manager – Products and Service (SMS)As the product lead for SMS for the Kalaam Group, the one-stop digital solutions provider, you will be working a lot on coordinating and communicating with internal departments and partners as well as other administrative tasks. We are looking for someone that is proactive and highly motivated towards carrying out their responsibility of performing a range of administrative tasks to support the Group Director of Commercials, as well as providing general support for the Department.Duties and Responsibilities:Leading Enterprise and wholesale SMS business vertical.
Developing SMS service business roadmap and strategies to enhance SMS business.
Managing SMS business unit (Technical and Commercial) to achieve the agreed roadmap and goals.
Management and coordination with carriers and SMS providers.
Performing process automation to enhance internal and external user experience, avoid revenue leakages, Auto provisioning etc.
Support sales team Identifying and Approaching potential clients in each sector.
Perform Cross Selling between SMS partners.
Responsible to increase sales for Wholesale and Enterprise SMS business.
Manage SMS process, policies, and procedures as well as the teams.
Be well-versed with SMS sender ID policies, rules, and regulations for all SMS destinations.
Responsible for maintaining and increase profitability on SMS services.
Introduce innovation and continuous enhancement to product portfolio
Management of product Capitals and Operating ExpenditureSkills
Skills: Bachelor’s degree in Business administration BBA, Bachelor’s degree of commerce B. Comm or any relevant degree.

Minimum 3 to 5 years relevant experience is must.
Deep knowledge and experience on SMS service technically as well as commercially.
Be well-versed with SMS sender ID policies, rules, and regulations for all SMS destinations.
